Header.title: Meyer's Lake Beverage and Drive Thru
Header.paragraph: Welcome! We pride ourselves on offering a wide selection of drinks that cater to all tastes and preferences. Our team is dedicated to providing exceptional customer service, so you can sit back and enjoy a stress-free shopping experience. With our convenient drive-thru, you can easily grab your favorite beverage without ever leaving your car. So swing on by and let us take care of all your liquor needs!

About.paragraph: We are currently uploading our catalogue to DoorDash so you have our extensive line of products at the reach of your thumb. Until then, you can order our items on

Features.title: Beer
Features.text: Check out our awesome variety of handcrafted and industrial beers

Features.title: Spirits and Wine
Features.text: Probably the best wine selection in all of Canton! Spirits? We've got them.

Features.title: Lottery tickets
Features.text: Get in on the excitement and try your luck with our lottery tickets! Stop by and pick up your chance to win big today.

Features.title: U-Haul
Features.text: Say goodbye to the hassle, discover the convenience of renting your U-Haul from us right here!
